town_halls.title: ERA Town Hall Meeting
town_halls.summary:
*Meeting with Enabling The Future*

# ERA Town Hall Meeting

**Date:** June 19, 2024 | **Duration:** 123 mins

**Links:** [View Meeting](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=view_recording_link&utm_medium=email) | [Ask Fathom](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=ask_fathom&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=ask_fathom&utm_medium=email)

## ACTION ITEMS ✨

- [ ] [Provide relevant ERA articles for Eliza's repository of regenerative solutions](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=4219.8399&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Create a form for ERA members to submit relevant articles for inclusion in Eliza's repository](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=4329.899899&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Reach out to Hugh Locke to discuss potential fundraising opportunities for the Haiti agroecology project and research feasibility of hosting student interns and study abroad programs](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=6756.5999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)


## Meeting Purpose

## Key Takeaways

- [Dr. Mooyoung Han presented his rainwater harvesting initiatives like rain schools, rain cities, and philosophy of managing all water for all by all](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=1095.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Eliza Herald proposed the Water Unity Network framework for coordinating watershed regeneration through local councils](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=3223.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Craig Erickson shared updates on his Haiti agroforestry center Harvest Craft and goals to relaunch mangrove restoration efforts](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=6747.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Topics

### Dr. Mooyoung Han's Rainwater Harvesting Presentation

- [Outlined philosophy of managing all water (visible/invisible) for all people (upstream/downstream) by everyone](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=1292.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Showcased examples like rainwater tanks, green roofs, water retention landscapes in Korea](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=1500.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Initiatives: Rain School (students learn climate change/rainwater), Rain City (citywide rainwater management)](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=1499.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Proposed collaborating to promote rain schools/cities globally](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=2499.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Eliza Herald's Water Unity Network Proposal

- [Organizational framework for coordinating watershed regeneration through local councils](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=3277.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Councils connect from headwaters to ocean, sharing wisdom/solutions](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=3618.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Proposed creating repository of ERA's water expertise to support local councils](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=4280.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Invited ERA to encourage community organizing along watersheds](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=3462.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Craig Erickson's Harvest Craft Update

- [Non-profit promoting agroecology in Haiti through training, tree nurseries, markets](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=6761.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Planted 10M+ trees 2020-2023 before Eden Projects funding ended](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=6805.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Goals: Relaunch mangrove restoration, expand agroforestry demos, farmer support](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=6389.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Seeking $250K in funding to rebuild operations in Haiti](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=6761.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Other Updates

- [Indy Boyle-Rhymes shared eco-restoration projects getting funded](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=4473.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Allison Wu introduced herself as AI/ML consultant for climate tech startups](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=4740.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Jon mentioned submitting ERA proposal](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=6747.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Next Steps

- [Connect Craig with Hugh Locke for potential funding sources](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=6793.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Explore collaborations between ERA and Water Unity Network](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=3223.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Allison to assist with creating literature repository](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=5030.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Follow up on ERA funding proposal submittal](https://fathom.video/share/yfHQbLa9x1GGfusW1en_gxXApY8YuWf9?tab=summary&timestamp=6747.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
